column1: Uchi////Machi Cure: Presented similar to nachos made of thinly sliced fried yucca chips topped with Asian pear
column2: lightly smoked yellow tail and garlic brittle. There was a wonderful contrast between the smoked yellow tail and the super sweet Asian pear that can only be described as perfect harmony. The yucca
column3: garlic brittle and almond provided the texture that is necessary.
